snippet: Lower sales from Yahoo’s two primary moneymakers highlight the challenge facing Marissa Mayer, the chief executive.
abstract: Yahoo reports revenue from firm's two primary moneymakers, display and search advertising, fell sharply in second quarter, highlighting challenge facing chief executive Marissa Mayer; profit was $331 million, or 30 cents a share, up 46 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue fell 7 percent to $1.14 billion.
lead_paragraph: Lower sales from Yahoo’s two primary moneymakers highlight the challenge facing Marissa Mayer, the chief executive.

headline.main: Yahoo Reports Sharp Decline in Revenue From  Advertising
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Reports a Sharp Decline in Revenue From Display and Search Advertising
